title: Bass Ackwards and Belly Up
description: Hitching the dream train isnt easy. Harper, Sophie, Kate, and Becca are four best friends who are in for a whirlwind ride of hope, humiliation, romance, tears, and laughteras well as amazing self-discovery in the year that changes everything.The path: Graduate high school, head to college. The dream: Try something daring and exciting. The plan: Help each other realize their greatest dreams.This smart and commercial first novel will appeal to readers of the New York Times bestselling Gossip Girl and A-List series.
author: Elizabeth Craft
